name: Dynamics Corporation
description:
Ludum Dare Entry 2020
Theme: Stuck in a loop

You are a robot created by Dynamics Corporation. Your objective is to perform simple tasks within the parameters outlined by your coding. The engineers who created you will also be monitoring your progress throughout your tasking. Make sure you do perform well or they'll reset your harddrive!

Unfortunately I wasn't able to complete the game within the time limit of the competition, but it's still playable to a certain extent and I hope you enjoy it :)

Standard WASD movement - Left mouse click to interact with objects.

To quit the game   Press ~ key and then type 'quit' and hit enter.

You can view the process I took while designing this here :)

https://www.twitch.tv/garfsnacks 

The game project is called 'thankyouforcalling'. 

Don't worry, it's the correct game. The theme of the project changed quite a bit in the initial stages of creation.
